description: VeraCrypt is a free open source disk encryption software for Windows, Mac OSX and Linux. Brought to you by IDRIX (https://www.idrix.fr) and based on TrueCrypt 7.1a.

installer.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/i', "$dir\setup.msi_", 'ACCEPTLICENSE=YES', 'DESKTOPICONS=No', '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the installation.' } | Out-Null

uninstaller.script: Invoke-ExternalCommand msiexec -ArgumentList @('/x', "$dir\setup.msi_", '/qn', '/norestart') -RunAs -ContinueExitCodes @{ 3010 = 'A system reboot is required to finalize the uninstallation.' } | Out-Null
